title: Acrolinx
description: Acrolinx is a Content Governance Solution, a software platform designed to create amazing content.
jobDescription: In my role as a Senior Frontend Engineer, I played a key part in the development of a web application for administration. On a daily basis, I focused on implementing features using React functional components written in Typescript. Additionally, I was responsible for conducting frontend testing using Jest and React Testing Library.

title: terminal.com.co
description: The online platform provides the most current information regarding bus routes and schedules. It is a comprehensive portal that allows you to access the latest data directly from the transportation companies. With our reliable and user-friendly platform, you can say goodbye to outdated information and enjoy a hassle-free commute.

title: CareConnect365
description: CareConnect365 was a US-based start-up idea with a focus on technology designed specifically for seniors to help them stay independent, healthy, and connected to family and friends.
jobDescription:
I was responsible for overseeing the entire development process. Our goal was to use React Native to reproduce an existing native app that facilitates contact between older relatives and their families. The goal was to make the UI easier to use and more accessible. In the project, I also took charge of the backend development of missing API functionalities using the Node.js web framework, Hapi.js, and MongoDB.

In my role as team lead, I assisted in setting up a fantastic team that put a product into production earlier than expected with complete customer satisfaction. My approach is always to be completely accessible so that I can assist with issues and share my knowledge and understanding with others, but I think this success was brought about by regular interaction with the customer, a mix of best practices we used, efficient cooperation, and open communication to identify the best solutions.

title: Infocyte
description: Infocyte is a cybersecurity company providing the leading platform for Incident Response and delivering cost-effective MDR services.
jobDescription:
During my time at Infocyte, I played an instrumental role in improving the performance and usability of the administrative user interface. Specifically, I made significant contributions by implementing a series of modifications that reduced the amount of boilerplate code and enhanced the UI's overall responsiveness.

To achieve these objectives, we replaced the Redux state management system with MobX, which streamlined the codebase and improved the UI's performance. Additionally, I leveraged React performance optimization hooks to further optimize the UI, resulting in faster load times and smoother navigation for users. Overall, these changes resulted in a more efficient and user-friendly experience for Infocyte's customers.

title: CropSwap
description: CropSwap is a marketplace type app that connects a global consumer-base with produce local to them.
jobDescription: As tech lead I was responsible for managing the technical aspects of a project, leading a team of engineers, ensuring high-quality technical solutions, and mentoring team members.

title: DUENIO
description: A start-up, the application is specifically created for landlords to verify the background of potential tenants.
jobDescription: Leading the charge as the principal developer, I played a pivotal role in spearheading the development of comprehensive mobile applications using React Native. From conceptualization to deployment, I leveraged my expertise in React Native to ensure seamless and efficient development of high-quality mobile applications that exceeded the expectations of end-users.

title: icl.com.co
description: A company in the metalworking sector founded in 1988.
jobDescription: As the lead web developer, I oversaw every aspect of the website's lifecycle, from initial planning to ongoing maintenance. To create an exceptional online shopping experience for customers, I integrated Joomla and VirtueMart into the website, seamlessly merging an online store with the rest of the site's functionality. In addition to my expertise in these technologies, I leveraged my proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create a dynamic, user-friendly website. By integrating these tools, customers were able to easily browse products, add items to their shopping cart, and complete their purchases without leaving the site. Finally, I provided the client with full control over updating and managing the website's content, ensuring that it remained current and relevant to their evolving needs.
